title: WTB: T206 Ty Cobb SGC 60 or better

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Ty Cobb SGC 60 or better
posts.post_content: Please let me know if you have one or have a tip on one [url]regeden@clear.net[/url] Looking for Green or Red (port) but would consider any? Must be nicely centered both ways, Thanks.
